dmca.title: [ABUSE] www.vponsale.com and rs2shopping.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
Policy Enforcement
Sent: Tuesday, April 18, 2006 7:27 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] www.vponsale.com and rs2shopping.com]

For your review.

Thank you,

The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Dear Sirs

www.vponsale.com (?the Website?)

We act for Jagex Limited. Our client has owned and operated RuneScape, the
well-known online multiplayer adventure game, since 2001. There are
currently some 4.1 million active registered players of the game in over 15
countries. Our client?s turnover in its last financial year to March 2005
